songs.title: If U Seek Amy (Crookers Remix)
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Oh! Oh oh
Oh! Oh oh
Oh! Oh oh (Love me)
Oh! Oh oh
Oh! Oh oh
Oh oh oh
Ha ha, hee hee, ha ha, ho
Oh! Oh oh
Oh! Oh oh
Oh! Oh oh (Hate me)
Oh oh
Oh oh oh
Oh oh oh
Ohh
Oh! Oh! Oh!
Ha ha, hee hee, ha ha, ho (Love me)
Ha ha ha ha (Oh oh oh oh oh)
(Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
(Hate me)
(yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, oh
Tell me, have you seen her? 'Cause I'm so, oh
Tell me, have you seen her? 'Cause I'm so, oh
Tell me, have you seen her? 'Cause I'm so-
Tell me, have you seen her? 'Cause I'm so-

[Chorus]
Love me, hate me, say what you want about me
But all of the boys and all of the girls are begging to if you seek Amy
Love me, hate me, but can't you see what I see?
All of the boys and all of the girls are begging to if you seek Amy
Love me, hate me, but can't you see what I see?
All of the boys and all of the girls are begging to if you seek Amy
Love me, hate me, say what you want about me
But all of the boys and all of the girls are begging to if you seek Amy
Love me, hate me, but can't you see what I see?
All of the boys and all of the girls are begging to if you seek Amy
Love me, hate me, say what you want about me
But all of the boys and all of the girls are begging to if you seek Amy
Love me, hate me, but can't you see what I see?
All of the boys and all of the girls are begging to if you seek Amy
Love me, hate me, say what you want about me
But all of the boys and all of the girls are begging to if you seek Amy
Love me, hate me, but can't you see what I see?
All of the boys and all of the girls are begging to if you seek Amy

[Breakdown 1]
Ha-ha-he-he-ha-ha-ho
Ha ha ha ha (Oh oh oh oh!)
(Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)
(Hate me)
(Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah)

[Pre-Chorus]
Oh, oh
Tell me, have you seen her? 'Cause I'm so, oh
Tell me, have you seen her? 'Cause I'm so, oh
Tell me, have you seen her? 'Cause I'm so-
Tell me, have you seen her? 'Cause I'm...

[Breakdown 2]
Oh! oh oh
Oh! oh oh
Oh! oh oh
(Love me)
Oh! oh oh
Oh! oh oh
Oh! oh oh
Ha-ha-he-he-ha-ha-ho
Oh! oh oh
Oh! oh oh
Oh! oh oh
(Hate me)
Oh! oh oh
Oh! oh oh
Oh! oh oh
Oh-oh-oh-oh
